00010 #include "Jamoma.h"
00011 
00012 #define NUM_INPUTS 1
00013 #define NUM_OUTPUTS 2
00014 
00015 // Data Structure for this object
00016 typedef struct _zerox {
00017         t_pxobject              x_obj;                  // This object - must be first
00018         void                    *obex;                  // Pointer to object extensions (for attributes)
00019         tt_zerox                *my_zerox;              // 
00020     tt_audio_signal     *signal_in[NUM_INPUTS];
00021     tt_audio_signal     *signal_out[NUM_OUTPUTS];
00022         long                    attr_size;              // 
00023 } t_zerox;
00024 
00025 // Prototypes for methods: need a method for each incoming message type
00026 void *zerox_new(t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv);                        // New Object Creation Method
00027 t_int *zerox_perform(t_int *w);                                                                         // An MSP Perform (signal) Method
00028 void zerox_dsp(t_zerox *x, t_signal **sp, short *count);                        // DSP Method
00029 void zerox_assist(t_zerox *x, void *b, long m, long a, char *s);        // Assistance Method
00030 t_max_err attr_set_size(t_zerox *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00031 void zerox_free(t_zerox *x);
00032 
00033 // Globals
00034 t_class *zerox_class;                                   // Required. Global pointing to this class
00035 
00036 
00037 /************************************************************************************/
00038 // Main() Function
00039 
00040 int main(void)                          // main recieves a copy of the Max function macros table
00041 {
00042         long attrflags = 0;
00043         t_class *c;
00044         t_object *attr;
00045         
00046         jamoma_init();
00047 
00048         c = class_new("tap.zerox~",(method)zerox_new, (method)zerox_free, (short)sizeof(t_zerox), 
00049                 (method)0L, A_GIMME, 0);
00050         class_obexoffset_set(c,calcoffset(t_zerox, obex));
00051 
00052         class_addmethod(c, (method)zerox_dsp,           "dsp", A_CANT, 0L);             
00053     class_addmethod(c, (method)zerox_assist,    "assist", A_CANT, 0L); 
00054 
00055         attr = attr_offset_new("size", _sym_long, attrflags,
00056                 (method)0L, (method)attr_set_size, calcoffset(t_zerox, attr_size));
00057         class_addattr(c, attr);
00058         
00059         class_dspinit(c);                               // Setup object's class to work with MSP
00060         class_register(CLASS_BOX, c);
00061         zerox_class = c;
00062         return 0;
00063 }
00064 
00065 
00066 /************************************************************************************/
00067 // Object Life
00068 
00069 // Create
00070 void *zerox_new(t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00071 {
00072         t_zerox *x = (t_zerox *)object_alloc(zerox_class);
00073         short i;
00074         
00075         if(x){
00076                 object_obex_store((void *)x, _sym_dumpout, (object *)outlet_new(x, NULL));      // dumpout
00077                 dsp_setup((t_pxobject *)x, 1);                          // Create Object and 1 Inlet (last argument)
00078                 outlet_new((t_pxobject *)x, "signal");          // Create a signal Outlet
00079                 outlet_new((t_pxobject *)x, "signal");          // Create a signal Outlet
00080                 
00081                 x->my_zerox = new tt_zerox;
00082                 for(i=0; i<NUM_INPUTS; i++)
00083                         x->signal_in[i] = new tt_audio_signal;
00084                 for(i=0; i<NUM_OUTPUTS; i++)
00085                         x->signal_out[i] = new tt_audio_signal;
00086 
00087                 x->attr_size = 0;
00088                 attr_args_process(x, argc, argv);                       //handle attribute args                 
00089         }
00090         return (x);                                                                             // Return the pointer
00091 }
00092 
00093 // Destroy
00094 void zerox_free(t_zerox *x)
00095 {
00096         short i;
00097         
00098         dsp_free((t_pxobject *)x);
00099         delete x->my_zerox;
00100         for(i=0; i<NUM_INPUTS; i++)
00101                 delete x->signal_in[i];
00102         for(i=0; i<NUM_OUTPUTS; i++)
00103                 delete x->signal_out[i];
00104 }
00105 
00106 /************************************************************************************/
00107 // Methods bound to input/inlets
00108 
00109 // Method for Assistance Messages
00110 void zerox_assist(t_zerox *x, void *b, long msg, long arg, char *dst)
00111 {
00112         if(msg==1)                      // Inlet
00113                 strcpy(dst, "(signal) Input");
00114         else if(msg==2){        // Outlet
00115                 switch(arg){
00116                         case 0: strcpy(dst, "(signal) number of zero crossings"); break;
00117                         case 1: strcpy(dst, "(signal) trigger"); break;
00118                         case 2: strcpy(dst, "(signal) dumpout"); break;
00119                 }
00120         }
00121 }
00122 
00123 
00124 // ATTRIBUTE: analysis size
00125 t_max_err attr_set_size(t_zerox *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00126 {
00127         x->attr_size = atom_getfloat(argv);
00128         x->my_zerox->set_attr(tt_zerox::k_analysis_size, x->attr_size);
00129         
00130         return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00131         #pragma unused(attr)
00132 }
00133 
00134 
00135 // Perform (signal) Method
00136 t_int *zerox_perform(t_int *w)
00137 {
00138         t_zerox *x = (t_zerox *)(w[1]);                                         // Pointer
00139     x->signal_in[0]->set_vector((t_float *)(w[2]));     // Input
00140     x->signal_out[0]->set_vector((t_float *)(w[3]));    // Output
00141     x->signal_out[1]->set_vector((t_float *)(w[4]));    // Output
00142         x->signal_in[0]->vectorsize = (int)(w[5]);                      // Vector Size
00143                         
00144         if (!(x->x_obj.z_disabled))     
00145                 x->my_zerox->dsp_vector_calc(x->signal_in[0], x->signal_out[0], x->signal_out[1]);
00146 
00147         return (w + 6); 
00148 }
00149 
00150 
00151 // DSP Method
00152 void zerox_dsp(t_zerox *x, t_signal **sp, short *count)
00153 {
00154         x->my_zerox->clear();
00155         x->my_zerox->set_sr(sp[0]->s_sr);
00156         dsp_add(zerox_perform, 5, x, sp[0]->s_vec, sp[1]->s_vec, sp[2]->s_vec, sp[0]->s_n);     // Add Perform Method to the DSP Call Chain
00157 }
